author: Greg Bluestein
title: Walker wont go to Marjorie Taylor Greene event after she spoke at pro-Putin rally

author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Prepare for surprises this week in Georgia politics

sentence: Trump ally Steve Bannon hit the panic button this week after seeing a poll that shows Trump-backed Georgia gubernatorial candidate David Perdue losing badly to incumbent Brian Kemp.
author: Brad Reed
title: Steve Bannon panics as Trump's attempt to beat Brian Kemp flops: 'Why is Perdue 27 points down?!'
